attributes.action: Extend the date on car theory tests
attributes.additional_details: You only get 2 years from passing your practical theory test to passing your driving test with being in lockdown for nearly a year or in tiers where we’ve not been able to have lessons or complete a driving test this seems unfair to not be extended
attributes.background: Extend the date on the theory test as people have lost months due to pandemic and may have to resit beige being able to take there driving test due to no fault of there own
